wifen.client.application

Class ClientApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • wifen.client.application.ClientApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionListener, ServerListener

    public class ClientApplication
extends javafx.application.Application
implements ServerListener, ConnectionListener
    Core of the Application. Manages all services and is responsible for starting the server or establishing network connections to a server.
    Author:
    Konstantin Schaper

      • startConnection

        public Connection startConnection(java.net.InetAddress address)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        <<<<<<< HEAD Connects to a remote or local host (server) and registers it with this application's service registry. Does not refresh the connection if there already is an active connection registered within this application's ServiceRegistry, even if the addresses do not match.
        Parameters:
        address - The internet address to connect to
        address -
        Returns:
        Either the newly established connection or the currently active connection, if there is any

      • startServer

        public Server startServer()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        <<<<<<< HEAD Creates a new server on the default port (ApplicationConstants.APPLICATION_PORT) and registers it with this application's service registry. If there already is an active server, it is returned and no new server is created.
        Returns:
        The freshly created server or the active one, if there is any
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a network error occurred ======= Put description here

      • hostGame

        public void hostGame(int maximumPlayerCount,
                     boolean spectatorsAllowed,
                     boolean mediaInitiallyVisible,
                     int maxDiceFaceCount,
                     java.lang.String playerName,
                     SpielerRolle standardPlayerRole,
                     GridType gridType)
        Instantiates a new GameProvider and registers it with this application's service registry, if there is none yet.
        Parameters:
        maximumPlayerCount - Maximum number of players allowed to join the game
        spectatorsAllowed - Whether passive players are allowed to watch the game
        mediaInitiallyVisible - Whether media data is initially visible or not
        maxDiceFaceCount - The largest kind of dice the players can roll
        playerName - The host's player name
        standardPlayerRole - The default role for new players
        gridType - The grid type for the playfield to display
